Function reference

To create a plot, you start with the tidyplot() function. Then you call add_*(), adjust_*() and theme_*() functions, preferably in that order. split_plot() must be last in this sequence and can only be followed by view_plot() and save_plot().

Create

tidyplot()
Create a new tidyplot

Add

Add plot components to represent data points, central tendency measures, dispersion and more.

Data points & amounts

add_data_points() add_data_points_jitter() add_data_points_beeswarm()
Add data points
add_line() add_area()
Add line
add_heatmap()
Add heatmap
add_count_bar() add_count_dash() add_count_dot() add_count_value() add_count_line() add_count_area()
Add count
add_sum_bar() add_sum_dash() add_sum_dot() add_sum_value() add_sum_line() add_sum_area()
Add sum

Central tendency

add_mean_bar() add_mean_dash() add_mean_dot() add_mean_value() add_mean_line() add_mean_area()
Add mean
add_median_bar() add_median_dash() add_median_dot() add_median_value() add_median_line() add_median_area()
Add median
add_curve()
Add curve

Dispersion & uncertainty

add_boxplot()
Add boxplot
add_violin()
Add violin plot
add_error() add_range() add_sd() add_ci95()
Add error bar
add_error_ribbon() add_range_ribbon() add_sd_ribbon() add_ci95_ribbon()
Add ribbon

Statistical comparison

add_stats_pvalue() add_stats_asterisks()
Add statistics

Distribution

add_histogram() add_density_histogram()
Add histogram
add_density_curve()
Add density curve

Proportion

add_areastack_absolute() add_areastack_relative()
Add area stack
add_barstack_absolute() add_barstack_relative()
Add bar stack
add_pie() add_donut()
Add pie or donut chart

Annotation

add_title() add_caption()
Add plot title or caption
add_text_labels()
Add text labels
add_reference_lines()
Add reference lines

Adjust

Adjust plot components, properties, data labels and themes.

Components & properties

adjust_x_axis() adjust_y_axis()
Adjust axes
adjust_colors()
Adjust colors
adjust_plot_size()
Adjust plot size
adjust_font()
Adjust font
adjust_legend()
Adjust legend
adjust_padding()
Adjust padding
adjust_rotate_plot()
Rotate plot by 90 degrees
adjust_description()
Adjust description

Axis and color labels

rename_x_axis_labels() rename_y_axis_labels() rename_color_labels()
Rename axis and color labels
reorder_x_axis_labels() reorder_y_axis_labels() reorder_color_labels()
Reorder axis and color labels
sort_x_axis_labels() sort_y_axis_labels() sort_color_labels()
Sort axis and color labels
reverse_x_axis_labels() reverse_y_axis_labels() reverse_color_labels()
Reverse axis and color labels

Themes

theme_tidyplot() theme_ggplot2() theme_minimal_xy() theme_minimal_y() theme_minimal_x()
Themes
remove_legend() remove_legend_title()
Remove legend or legend title
remove_padding()
Remove padding
remove_x_axis() remove_x_axis_line() remove_x_axis_ticks() remove_x_axis_labels() remove_x_axis_title()
Remove x axis or parts of it
remove_y_axis() remove_y_axis_line() remove_y_axis_ticks() remove_y_axis_labels() remove_y_axis_title()
Remove y axis or parts of it

Colors

colors_discrete_metro colors_discrete_circle colors_discrete_candy colors_discrete_pastel colors_discrete_seaside
Discrete color schemes
colors_continuous_viridis colors_continuous_magma colors_continuous_inferno colors_continuous_plasma colors_continuous_cividis colors_continuous_rocket colors_continuous_mako colors_continuous_turbo colors_continuous_bluepinkyellow
Continuous color schemes
colors_diverging_blue2brown colors_diverging_blue2red colors_diverging_BuRd colors_diverging_BuYlRd
Diverging color schemes

Split

Split the plot into a multi plot layout, eventually across multiple pages.

split_plot()
Split plot into subplots

Output

Output the final plot or intermediate stages to the screen or to a file.

view_plot()
View plot on screen
save_plot()
Save plots to file

Helpers

add()
Add ggplot2 code to your tidyplot
format_number() format_p_value()
Format numbers and p values
all_rows() filter_rows() max_rows() min_rows() first_rows() last_rows() sample_rows()
Subset data
new_color_scheme()
New color scheme
